interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.UserInterfaceSettings.LanguageDisplay
interface.description: This interface shows the language the UI is in and allows changing the display language

property.name: DisplayLanguage
property.description: This is the RFC 5646 tag of the current language being used by the device user interface

property.name: SupportedDisplayLanguages
property.description: This is a list of supported languages using RFC 5646 tags
